short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a drop down to quickly access to recently viewed Pull Requests and Issues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you stuck in a pile of PR and Issues on a big project?  Are only a few of them relevant to you? If so, This might be for you.

- Quicly access to your recently viewed PRs / Issues
- Save upto 1000 history per repository to your local storage
